page.title: 11Occupations, Snape, Yorks.
page.content: The most popular occupation is farming. Five people work in shops, and ten people work in schools doing various jobs. Eleven people work at Carricks, two of them bagging potatoes,and the others sell fruit, vegetables and fish at the markets. Eight people work in offices and four people are sales representatives. There are a lot of occupations which are not so popular, such as plumber, copywriter, nursery nurse, coalman, computer operator, dental nurse, R.A.C Man and gunsmith. In the village we have a Post Office which employs one person, and two garages with three mechanics. The majority of the working population go out of the village to work each day.
